name: Pancakes
preparation: 1. Mix the flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt. 2. Beat the eggs and mix with milk. 3. Combine wet and dry ingredients. 4. Cook on a griddle and serve with butter and maple syrup.

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
preparation: 1. Grill the chicken and slice it. 2. Chop the lettuce. 3. Toss the lettuce with croutons, parmesan, and dressing. 4. Top with grilled chicken and season with salt and pepper.

name: Beef Stroganoff
preparation: 1. Sauté the onions and garlic. 2. Add the beef and cook until browned. 3. Add mushrooms and cook until soft. 4. Stir in flour, mustard, and sour cream. 5. Simmer and season with salt, pepper, and parsley.

name: Apple Pie
preparation: 1. Preheat the oven to 180°C. 2. Prepare the crust with flour, butter, sugar, and salt. 3. Slice the apples and mix with cinnamon and lemon juice. 4. Fill the crust with apples and cover with a top crust. 5. Brush with beaten egg and bake for 45-50 minutes.
